db:article.db:para: The Clipper library performs line & polygon clipping - intersection, union, difference & exclusive-or, and line & polygon offsetting.
Used in the QML plugin of Qt Location and in Qt Positioning.
The sources can be found in qtpositioning/src/3rdparty/clipper.
